channel.title: Will someone make me my own client details inside
channel.description: If you make me my own client with owners name bombom53 idc pass i can change you will be made an admin with unlimited power and very very few ristrictions other then no duping and no spawning monsters to kil people in random areas such as banks or pking or minigames.

item.title: Will someone make me my own client details inside
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

This is a help section, not a section to ask people to do things for you. I suggest you read through the posts in this section, download some of the source code releases and just try stuff out. If you have a problem with a specific thing, e.g., receiving X error when doing Y, then feel free to make another post.

Read full topic
item.source: Will someone make me my own client details inside

item.title: Will someone make me my own client details inside
item.dc:creator: @degenerate degenerate
item.description:
@degenerate wrote:

bombom53:

im not good with java or any of that other stuff most of it doesnt work for me either so i cant really do it but you know if someone wants to tell me how in a way that i can understand then that would be cool

Then go learn java, you imbecile.

runekillzz:

im good with costum items Can i make costum items for your client? if i get admin on it and every item i make i get 100 of it in the game?

I lol’d. Why not make them for your own client, instead of asking for his permission to spawn (x) items that YOU made?

Read full topic

item.title: Will someone make me my own client details inside
item.dc:creator: @Kozy Kozy
item.description:
@Kozy wrote:

Lawl… you want someone to make you a client… and then you say make the owners name bombom53, and you don’t care about the pass? I [b]think…[b] you mean someone give you a source with an administrator account named bombom53?

Please go to http://www.lmgtfy.com/?q=Definition+of+"Client"
